column4: <ompaul> fde, is it not obvious, the software he wants to run is on windows to access ....... ext3 .... you would not expect a windows channel to support something like reading ntfs from a gnu/linux system <-- Actually, we do.
ehh read my comment again - ntfs reading using ubuntu is in factoids here
Yes, but if you ask that question in ##Windows, we do answer. That's what I meant. It was also directed at fde's "they will laugh at him."
